pr_title: [JENKINS-59592] Link issue column to selected type

timeline.message: Link issue column to selected type
Resolve locale problme when using toLowerCase

timeline.bodyText:
Make this more object oriented (tell don't ask).
Add a getUrl method in StatisticsProperties. And there add an additional constructor parameter that provides the URL.  E.g. in https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/src/main/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/util/IssuesStatistics.java#L243:
NEW_HIGH(Messages._Statistics_New_High(), IssuesStatistics::getNewHighSize, "new/high"),

There is no need to compute it using an algorithm.
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.author: uhafner

timeline.author: uhafner

replies.author: XiongKezhi

timeline.bodyText:
I would expect that some tests fail after your change: https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/src/test/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/core/columns/IssuesTotalColumnTest.java#L83
There should be a reference to new? Also it would be nice to have a test that uses a severity.
timeline.author: uhafner

replies.bodyText:
It passes the tests because I forgot changing the getUrl() in IssuesTotalColumnfrom the beginning 😄
I'll change it this time.
replies.author: XiongKezhi
